title: Senior Software Engineer (Placement : Batu Kajang)
description:
Job Descriptions:

  • Develop application and existing programs by analyzing and identifying areas for modification as per request by client 
  • Support client operational activities 
  • Write and test code 
  • Refining and rewriting it as necessary and communicate with any programmers involved in the project research  
  • Design and write new software programs (e.g. business applications or computer games) and computer operating systems 
  • Evaluate the software and systems

Requirements: 

  • Bachelor degree of Computer Science, Information System, or Informatic Engineering
  • Min. 2 year experience in the related field. 
  • Preferably experienced with Java Programming Language (Spring Boot framework), Laravel, JavaScript (ReactJS)
  • Familiar with .Net (C#, .Net Core)
  • Familiar with SQL Server / Postgre SQL 
  • Familiar with API, micro service and container

Placement location in Batu Kajang, Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia

Xapiens is a full-service Information, Communications, and Technology (ICT) company. 

With over a decade of experience in serving top tier companies, we offer a variety of solutions and services designed to add value at both user and enterprise levels.

/WE ARE HUMAN TECHNOLOGY/

At PT Xapiens Teknologi Indonesia, we are collaborative, innovative, open, driven, and fast-paced.

What Xapiens Do? and What We Care About?

description:

• Strong verbal, written, and organizational skills

• Fluent in spoken and written English

• Good communication and interpersonal skills

• Can do attitude/mindset

Responsibilities:

• Seek out and source new clients by developing networks and independently identifying and

developing relevant resources for sales and business development.

industries.

• Perform any other duties as assigned by the designated supervisor from time to time.

Waresix connects shippers and businesses with available warehouses and trucks across Indonesia.
company.culture:

We offer enormous opportunities for employees to explore themselves. This is a great place to build careers and be part of an innovative and creative team.  A dynamic and tech-driven company where we can work happily, passionately, and grow incredibly.

title: Corporate Communication Officer (Remote)
description:
We are looking for a Corporate Communications Officer who is responsible for creating and promoting internal and external communications contents on behalf of Flip with different target audiences to bolster and safeguard company's reputation. 


About Flip
Flip helps people send money securely with the best experience in Indonesia. Individual users are able to use Flip to send money across 88 banks in Indonesia with zero cost. Meanwhile, business users can send money swiftly, securely, and at a lower cost to more than 100 banks across Indonesia.

At Flip, we value fairness. We believe that we have to treat employees, customers, and all stakeholders fairly and respectfully. Fair treatment for employees means we establish clear goals, facilitate our employees to achieve them, and value their contribution to the company with equitable benefits.


What you'll do:

  • Working with cross department to develop, write, edit, and distribute communications materials, including press release, feature article, correspondence, stand-by statements, and social media contents as required
  • Manage day-to-day media relations and media inquiries as well as cultivate relationship with key corporate affairs influencers 
  • Collaborate with other stakeholders to execute public relations events, including press briefing, workshop, gathering, and other corporate events
  • Develop talking points and presentation for speaking engagement purposes
  • Monitor various types of media channels regarding brand and corporate issues and other relevant topics


What you'll need:

  • A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree from a top university
  • Min. 1 year of professional experience in a communications role
  • Excellent written and verbal communications skills both in Bahasa Indonesia and English
  • High attention to details and accuracy
  • Good creative skills 
  • Having experience in media relations
  • Great interpersonal skills to interact effectively with internal and external stakeholders

company.name: Flip
company.pitch: Flip lets users transfer funds between different banks in Indonesia without any cost.
company.culture:
We strive to be the fairest company in the world.

Yes! At Flip, we value fairness. We believe that we have to treat employees, customers, and all stakeholders fairly and respectfully. Fair treatment for employees means we establish clear goals, facilitate our employees to achieve them, and value their contribution to the company with equitable benefits.

Exciting time awaits!

We face new and exciting challenges every day and need your help to solve them. Join our fun, honest, reliable, and love-able team and let's build the fairest financial company in the world!

What do you say?
company.description: Flip lets users transfer funds between different banks in Indonesia without any cost.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description:

  • Leverage sales from digital channel
  • Responsible to increase brand awareness


Key Duties:

  • Manage and post core business-related content on social media platforms
  • Develop strategies that drive customers to the website
  • Improve the design, UX, traffic, and content of the website
  • Create paid campaigns on social media platforms
  • Maintain consistent brand messaging and awareness throughout all platforms

  • Use advanced metrics to measure the success of a marketing campaign

company.name: Klinik Pintar
company.pitch: Klinik Pintar is an Indonesia-based health tech startup that helps its users book teleconsultations, virtual health services, as well as in-clinic sessions.
company.culture:
At Klinik Pintar, we love to innovative, collaborative and passionate to produce helpful health technology and care services.

...

Benefits:

  • Compensation: Competitive monthly salary with overtime pay, Religious Holiday Allowance
  • Family: Paid maternity and paternity leave
  • Lifestyle: Fully remote working (WFH), Collaborative, google suites work environment
  • Progression: Professional development support for tools and courses
  • Health: Paid sick days, health reimbursement system and BPJS coverage, free Manage care services, Free tele-consultation with medical doctor, and special discounts in every health services provided by Klinik Pintar 

...

Our "H-E-L-P" Culture:

  • Honest: There will be always things that need improvement, but so many things that are done well. We encourage everyone to honest convey both, good things as appreciation and bad things as input.
  • Empathic: We believe, every great product built with deep understanding for all the stakeholders. Yes, we're talking about being empathic to our own team, not just customers.
  • Learner: We love to think as a beginner than an expert. We turn mistakes as learning opportunities rather than failures.
  • Persevere: Healthcare industry is a long journey business. Persistence in doing something despite difficulty or delay in achieving success is needed here.

title: Copywriter (For Getplus.id)
description:
Job Description : 

• Author marketing headlines that grab attention 

• Write high-engagement communications that reflects the brand of the company 

• Craft persuasive messages, tell compelling stories, and enhance our brand voice 

• Write original copy and edit content for a range of corporate marketing and communications materials 

• Collaborate to develop a variety of creative contents 

• Interpret creative direction and adapt points from creative briefs into persuasive copy concepts 

• Produce error-free copy/content that adheres to the company’s style guidelines 

• Conduct research into target audiences for creative content 

• Simultaneously manage multiple projects with short deadlines



Job Requirement : 

• Minimum 3 year experience in producing copy for digital, print, and broadcast channels, preferably with a marketing or creative agency 

• A bachelor’s degree in journalism, marketing, creative writing, communications, or related fields 

• Outstanding written and verbal communication skills, as well as exceptional grammar and command of the Bahasa Indonesia and English languages 

• A strong understanding of the components of compelling, action-inducing communications 

• A strong knack for communication strategy and an eye for the long-term scalability of communication decisions 

• Focus and strong attention to detail, updated on current trends

title: Group Head of Administration
description:
If you just click apply, you will not receive a response. You must follow the instructions below under 'how to apply' for our team to review and respond to your application. Complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours.

SUMMARY OF OPPORTUNITY

  • Title: Group Head of Administration
  • Level: Manager Level
  • Based In: Deliveree HQ in South Jakarta
  • Responsibility: Groupwide across 4 countries

Deliveree is seeking a Head of Administration. The role is responsible for oversight of administration and human resources across our group which includes teams in Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines. While this position is based in our South Jakarta HQ, there will be regular travel of approximately 1 week every month to our other international offices (such travel is suspended during the pandemic).

Our Head of Administration will be responsible for managing our administration and human resources staff in Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines. The average team admin and HR team size per country is about 3-4 people totaling a groupwide team size of approximately 15 people. 

No prior experience in company administration or human resources is required (we will train you), however you must have very strong people management, team management, program management, and project management skills. 

If this position regional position excites you, please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under HOW TO APPLY.

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Full-time work experience of 7+ years
  • Undergraduate GPA 3.5 or higher
  • Masters degree not required
  • English skills TOEFL 550+ (other English test scores are acceptable)
  • Demonstrated people and team management skills
  • Demonstrated program and project management skills
  • Strong presentation and communication skills
  • Strong spreadsheet and analysis skills

BENEFITS

  • Challenging, fulfilling career
  • Regular international travel
  • Competitive monthly salary
  • 13th month annual salary bonus
  • Annual paid leave
  • Full private healthcare coverage
  • Mobile phone allowance
  • Numerous other company perks

HOW TO APPLY

Send an email to tom@deliveree.com with the below items. If you submit all the required materials and your qualifications fit our search, you will hear back from us within 24 hours.

  1. Cover email
  2. PDF resume
  3. Completed pre-interview form
  4. University grades or transcript

Download Pre-Interview Form: https://dlvr.ee/3kpgNvw 

MORE ABOUT DELIVEREE

https://www.deliveree.com 

CNN INTERVIEW

https://youtu.be/2yvxncgonZE 

RECRUITMENT SITE

https://www.deliveree.com/id/en/careers-home/ 

CAREERS BLOG

https://www.deliveree.com/id/en/deliveree-career-karir-think-different/ 

HQ OFFICE TOUR

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=giz5WrjkRO0

company.name: Deliveree Indonesia
company.pitch: Deliveree is an exciting growth stage logistics technology company that operates Indonesia's leading mobile app and logistics platform to bring customers who need to send cargo together with transporters. We are an international company with teams and offices located in Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, and Indonesia. Within Indonesia, our HQ is located in Kemang, South Jakarta.
company.culture:
Deliveree's culture is all about accelerated career development for our young professionals, lots of real world work responsibility, heavy work loads, high individual productivity, a winning spirit, and having fun. 

A DAY AT DELIVEREE

-Meetings and conference calls

-Project and team based working sessions

-Analysis & problem solving

-Lots of spreadsheet work

-Lots of presenting and communication

-Tons of challenges

BENEFITS & PERKS

-Free buffet lunches

-Rent subsidies for kost living

-Full private healthcare insurance

-Paid annual leave allowances

-13th month bonuses

-Casual work attire

-Awesome startup style office

title: Web Developer
description:
• Develop new user-facing features

• Build reusable code and libraries for future use

• Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs

• Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability

• Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end

• Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

Minimum Qualifications

• Bachelor Degree in Computer Science / Information Technology

• Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3

• Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS

• Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery

• Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX

• Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.

• Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.

• Experience in JavaScript using framework Vue.js and Express.js

title: Senior Marketing Manager
description:
We are looking for a candidate with a strong brand and marketing knowledge at our high-growth organization. You need to be hands-on, while also able to build and manage a team. 

The right leader will be a marketing generalist with experience covering online and offline brand building, customer acquisition, Public Relations (PR), digital marketing, design, and B2B marketing-focused events to drive business and revenue growth.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

● Generate overall marketing strategy, including offline marketing (branding, activation, partnership, and commercial strategies including the revenue-generating from the marketing division. 

● Responsible to lead the marketing team that consists of 4 (four) pillars: Marketing Communication, Digital Marketing, Commercial - Activation, and Creative and content. 

● Plan out major marketing monthly campaigns and Public Relations initiatives.

● Coordinate with cross-functional departments (Sales, Operation, Community teams) to plan out key goals and outcomes.

● Lead Digital Marketing strategies (SEM, SMM, and SEO) with the digital marketing team, including product marketing for GoWork App.

● Develop, structure, and nurture relationships with all relevant and external partners, to achieve the company’s target key metrics. 

● Oversee the creative content and marketing messages distribution on all channels.

● Create and manage marketing budget and be able to deliver results within budget.

● Generate reports & data analysis, including the competitors screening to C-level and management.

● Achieve company’s Objective Key Results and monitor Marketing KPIs

REQUIREMENTS:

● Work experience in the related field and have handled most of the responsibilities mentioned above for at least 5 years (suggested: 5-6 Years)

● Bachelor degree from a reputable university, min GPA 3.00 from 4.00 Scale

● Strategic and analytical thinker

● Knowledge of the B2B and B2C and have vast connections with influencers and key opinion leaders (KOL)

● Results-driven and able to ensure completion of tasks

● Highly organized and detail-oriented

● Excellent interpersonal, written, and communication skills (English and Indonesia)

● Willing to work hard and has a proven track record toward details

● Positive attitude and high maturity level and skill to lead the team

*Only shortlisted candidate that we will contact for further process

company.name: GoWork
company.pitch: GoWork is Indonesia’s coworking space with a mission to help people be their best by providing world-class workspaces that are inspiring and fully equipped with amenities and tools to help companies thrive.
company.culture:
GoWork is Indonesia’s leading premium coworking space.  Our mission and purpose of existence are to help people be their best by reinventing the way they work. 

  1. We provide world-class workspaces that are fully equipped with amenities and layout in accordance with our researched spatial design.
  2. We foster strong relationships within our diverse member community by facilitating collaborative discussions and hosting exclusive member activities.
  3. We contribute to building Indonesia’s startup ecosystem by hosting regular events for people from all interests, industries, and backgrounds.
  4. We support our members with partnerships for services that meet their ongoing business needs and provide lifestyle benefits for their enjoyment.
  5. We are uniquely technology-enabled with our GoWork app.

Founded in 2016, our co-founders have combined their passions and decades of experience in Real Estate, Community Building, Finance, Operation, and Technology. GoWork operates over 25 hub locations, along with 20 satellite locations across Jakarta and Bali, that are bookable through our app. Our team continues to host more than 60 events each month, attracting over 1,000 attendees.

Affiliated companies: Gobi Ventures, Convergence Ventures, 500 Startups, ISMAYA, Ideafest

BENEFITS AND PERKS

Compensation
     Competitive salary, learning & education reimbursement

Lifestyle
    Casual dress code, flexible* locations, fun and engaging team, and work environment

Amenities
    Free food*, coffee & tea 

Progression
     A fast-growing company, dedicated Founders, training, and professional development

Welfare
     Employee discounts, health insurance, paid sick days

And many more...

GOWORK VALUES (IN.V.E.N.T)

  1. INclusive
    . We have a strong spirit of collaboration and teamwork.  
    . We believe that we can achieve bigger and greater things together and believe in the magic of a strong community.
  2. Vigorous
    . We take good care of our health (mind, body, and soul), which gives us full energy and mental sharpness.  
    . Being healthy allows us to have positive energy, go the extra mile and deliver our best quality.
  3. Entrepreneurial
    . Each of us is an entrepreneur: we are competitive and have a desire to WIN!
    . Dare to work hard and continuously build a growth mindset.
    . Passionate and do things with purpose.
    . Love challenges, find creative solutions, embrace continuous learning, and first grab opportunities.
  4. Noble
    . We always do the right thing and honor trustworthiness and integrity.  
    . These are the things we do when no one is looking, no matter what our beliefs and religions are.
  5. Thankful
    . We are grateful and positive every moment and every day because we are blessed.

If you share the above values, we urge you to apply!

title: Account Payable Associate
description:
About Rukita

Rukita is the nation’s leading community-driven proptech company, improving urban living across major cities and for hundreds of members. We perfect the modern hassle-free rental experience using our unique approach, designing and operating co-living experiences.

Rukita’s design-driven and end-to-end property management services - powered by technology - allows us to meet the needs of today’s urban living. Focusing on community, convenience and experience, we constantly push the boundaries of quality lives at an affordable price.

The Rukita family is made out of a motley crew of real estate professionals, engineers, technologists, community builders, designers, marketers, happiness officers, and so much more. As a family, we work cohesively, collaboratively, value entrepreneurship, and do whatever it takes to deliver happiness in a living space.

Responsibility

  • Manage AP cycle for the following categories: monthly billings, third party payments, daily expenses, petty cash, reimbursements, and miscellaneous expenses                    
    • Audit and review weekly and monthly bills, and ensure all requirements are received in accordance with company policies before submissions.
    • Data entry and posting of invoices to Master Account Payables
    • Provide timely and accurate payment lists to the cashier according to the payment schedule.
    • Perform payment processing in accordance with company guidelines and vendor payment terms.
    • Perform reconciliations of AP-related accounts and resolution of associated issues.
    • Manage month-end closing reports, including AP reports.
  • Work closely with internal and external business partners to resolve AP inquiries in a timely manner
  • Optimize the payment operation process, identify risks and opportunities, and take a proactive approach to improve the payment system.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in business administration, accounting, finance, or related fields.
  • 2-3 years experience in account payable.
  • Knowledge of account payable principles, a thorough understanding of applicable AP system, financial chart of accounts, and procedures.
  • Having experience using accounting system would prioritize such as SAP, etc.
  • Possess time management skills with the ability to prioritize job tasks effectively.
  • Ability to adapt to changing organizational and operational needs.
  • Detail-oriented, professional attitude, reliable.
  • Ability to work independently and with a team in a fast-paced and high-volume environment with an emphasis on accuracy and timeliness.
  • Proficient in MS Office: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, experience in accounting system Xero is a plus.

title: Legal Manager
description:
Responsibilities: 

· Offering counsel on a variety of Legal Issue, including but not limited to advisory, agreement drafting, agreement reviewing, legal analysis and product exploration and risk identification.

· Working alongside other departments within the company 

· Advising on contract status, legal risks, and the legal liabilities associated with different deals.

· Researching and anticipating unique legal issues that could impact the company.

· Leading corporate legal strategy to protect the company's interests.

· Providing continued support on the creation, standardization and implementation of company’s legal compliance, policies, terms & conditions, internal working procedures and standard operational guidelines.

Requirements: 

· Having minimum 6 years of experience as legal counsel, preferably a mix of law firm and in house experience

· Must have a strong strategic thinking.

· Implement and maintain contracts management system

· Review and revise a variety of contracts and other legal documents

· Giving continued support on the creation, standardization and implementation of legal compliance, policies, terms & conditions, internal working procedures and standard operational guidelines

· Strong drafting, negotiation and client communication skills both in English and Indonesian

· Have a good leadership skills to work with cross-functional teams and all relevant stakeholders.

title: Business Analyst - General Trade
description:
Job Description 

  1. Work closely with Head of Category supporting various initiatives and special projects.
  2. Understanding of business unit process, which covers end-to-end business, operations and product development to identify key opportunities.
  3. Define, monitor and evaluate key business metrics, conducting analysis that leads to actionable insights for business and operational improvements.
  4. Develop workflow, SOP and blueprint for core business processes, benchmark to industry best practices.
  5. Acting as PMO to manage ongoing projects with multiple stakeholders.

Requirements

  1. Bachelor's Degree in any major, preferably in Business Management/MBA, Engineering or Computer Science.
  2. Fresh graduates with relevant internship experience and graduates <2 years working experience in fast-paced environment are welcomed to apply.
  3. Highly analytical with a structured approach to problem-solving.
  4. Ability to learn independently and quickly, with a strong "team player" attitude.
  5. Exceptional communication/public speaking skills for stakeholder management.
  6. Excellent time-management and adaptability skills to meet tight deadlines and balance simultaneous workstreams.

company.name: Payfazz (PT. Payfazz Teknologi Nusantara)
company.pitch: PAYFAZZ provides payment facilities such as money transfer, phone credit, electricity bill, game, e-commerce, and merchant payment. We are building distributed network agents in Indonesia.
company.culture:
What we care about

Start Small : In Payfazz we believe that every work is meaningful, nothing is too big or too small. Every e-mail, presentation, and code has build what we have today. Give your best in every step of the way, and in turn you will make something amazing happen.

Take a lead : We believe that everyone is capable to improve the status quo. Here at Payfazz, we encourage everyone to take a lead in doing their work. By giving them the autonomy and ownership that they need, they will unleash their creativity and keep looking for the best practice.

Eager to grow : In every part of our work, there is always room for improvement and growth. We believe that every moment is an opportunity to improve yourself and your work. People at Payfazz are encourged to learn hard, work hard, and play hard.

Pro-Customer : Be thoughtful and alert to the needs of others. Act to understand and respond appropriately by always upholding integrity as well as being aware of the risk in everything we do.

About our Company & Team

PAYFAZZ is an Indonesian financial technology company, founded in 2016 by three childhood friends, that aims to empower small medium enterprise & the rural populations with technology to build Indonesia's digital economy. Currently, PAYFAZZ has over 400 employees in four cities in Indonesia.

In 2017 PAYFAZZ was seeded by Y Combinator, and in 2019 PAYFAZZ was included in Y Combinator’s Top 100 Companies. PAYFAZZ also had the honor of being crowned FORBES 30 Under 30, being named as the fastest moving businesses of the SME sector, and being the Best Company to work for in Asia.
